Annotations
• 
Annotations are linguistic information or metadata 
associated to the content in documents 
• 
Annotations consist of features with a name and a 
value. E.g.: dog   TOKEN  kind=word
pos=NN (Part of speech) 
length=3
GATE
•NP: proper noun
•VBD: verb past tense
•DT: determiner
•NN: noun-singular
